name: Terratopia: March of The Demon King
storyline:
Control Akio, adventurer princess of the small agrarian kingdom of Shuna, and do whatever it takes to protect your home from The Demon King and the encroaching forces of darkness. Will you train with the town militia? Or raid forgotten dungeons in search of magical artifacts? Beseech the gods for help? Or recruit mercenaries from the nearby port city?

The Demon King will be here soon and only by making the best use of your time will you be able to save your home.
summary: Terratopia: March of The Demon King is narrative puzzle game, a choose your own adventure, and a love letter to the RPGs of your childhood.
